Text.Name: SYS_FightSkill_Body_AngerFire
Text.Desc: Recall the [b][my_property=BodyPractice_AngerFireNum|{0:F0}][/b] most painful memories of your life, and transform these negative emotions into a furious berserk. Lasts [b][my_property=BodyPractice_AngerFireDuration|{0:F0}][/b] seconds. The stronger the negative emotions, the stronger the effect.
